turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I would like to order a Starbucks espresso, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it, and what size did you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and which starbucks did you want to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Write the pick up for East Craig Road in North Las Vegas, Nevada.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, can I get whipped cream, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what kind of milk did you want to use?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's a grande cappucccino with 2%, whipped cream, and a dash of cinnamon from the starbucks at East Craig Road.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great you're all set, the order will be ready in 15 minutes and you'll get a text receipt.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much for your help. I appreciate it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no problem, have a great day.
